content:
chelsea Clinton Hillary Clintons daughter spoke at her mothers campaign headquarters in West Chester to rally support and recruit canvassers on Monday April  PERIOD

West Chester Mayor Carolyn Comitta presented Chelsea Clinton with a key to the city prior to her speech PERIOD

I think of this as a key to the future said Comitta and the Clinton family is a key to our future. comitta the first female mayor of West Chester endorsed the Clinton campaign PERIOD

We need elected officials who can work with everyone to make a better world for our children Comitta said PERIOD

Chair of the Chester County Democratic Committee Brian McGinnis also attended the event PERIOD Both were personally thanked and recognized by Chelsea Clinton PERIOD

Around  people wereinto the meeting room at Hillary Clintons campaign headquarters on West Gay Street to hear the former  and possibly future  presidents daughter speak PERIOD

Im happy to hear a young advocate speak said Michael Niemeyer of East Goshen PERIOD Like her parents she is eloquent in that respect. the Trump rally drew most of the campuss attention but dedicated Hillary Clinton supporters still showed to hear Chelsea Clinton and show their support through phonebanks and doortodoor canvassing PERIOD

Hillary Clinton is one of the only candidates that has a clear precise plan said Owen Moore a senior criminal justice major PERIOD Shes not offering promises PERIOD Shes not running a demagogue campaign. while some attendees were solid in their support of Clinton others like Tom Vee of West Chester were still hesitant PERIOD

I wanted to see the Clinton family in person PERIOD I hear a lot about them in the media and I want to peg them down for myself Vee said PERIOD

Chelsea Clinton began her speech by declaring This is the most important presidential election of my life. chelsea Clinton voted for her mother earlier this week in New York PERIOD

I didnt know I could care more about politics until I became a mother she said PERIOD

Chelsea Clinton who is expecting her second child commented that she was quite visibly pregnant. i worry that everything I care most about is at risk Clinton said PERIOD We need to build upon the progress made by Obama. chelsea Clinton spoke highly of the Affordable Care Act and recalled her mothers advocacy for the program in the early nineties PERIOD

I remember in  and  when my mom fought for universal healthcare she said.I dont think Ive ever heard my mom sayIm tired. we have to continue to fight for progress for our children. according to Chelsea Clinton Hillary Clinton advocated strongly in favor of the Childrens Health Insurance Program which assists in providing coverage to children and mothers PERIOD

In  we had more pregnant women with access to prenatal care able to give birth in safe environments than ever before in American history said Chelsea Clinton PERIOD

Chelsea Clinton promoted her mothers bipartisan successes saying We need a fighter but we also need a problem solver. we live in an increasingly dangerous world said Chelsea Clinton PERIOD I hope my children feel about me someday as I do about my mother. chelsea Clinton spoke for around  minutes and afterwards answered questions from the crowd which included questions about mental health issues and clarification on Affordable Care Act reform PERIOD

On mental health issues Chelsea Clinton said Not only should we invest in mental health services we need to invest in research PERIOD We dont know enough about how each person can best live up to their potential. chelsea Clinton also addressed issues on mental health care for veterans who have been long neglected in terms of mental health services PERIOD

We should give our veterans vouchers to receive treatment in the private sector not sit around and wait Chelsea Clinton said PERIOD

Chelsea Clinton said her mother supported enfranchising pharmacists into the healthcare system and challenged pharmaceutical providers that overprice drugs PERIOD

We need to expand the statute so the government has the authority to launch investigations when drug companies arent just funding research or covering costs but exploiting people at their most vulnerable said ChelseaClinton PERIOD

Some attendees were high school students voting for their first time in the primary on Tuesday April  PERIOD

Im upset that most people my age dont care about who our next president is going to be said a local high school student and Hillary Clinton supporter PERIOD

Chelsea Clinton attributed the problem to a lack of early civic education PERIOD

Only  states currently require civics courses said Chelsea Clinton PERIOD My mom was an early supporter of universal voter registration at  PERIOD If we sent draft cards to every man when they turned  we can send voter registration to everyone. at the speechs conclusion many attendees set out to canvass both in person and over the phone PERIOD

Im so grateful for all you have done and will do to support my mom said Chelsea Clinton PERIOD

Moore considers Hillary Clinton to be the most experienced and prepared for the job. i just wish more college students would realize that instead of just feeling the Bern because its popular said Moore PERIOD

Doug Myers is a is a fourthyear student majoring in liberal studies with minors in philosophy andjournalism PERIOD He can be reached atDM793099wcupa.edu PERIOD
